title: 6 S74 Silks 39.99 to 199.99. Sold & Price Drop
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: 6 S74 Silks 39.99 to 199.99. Sold & Price Drop
posts.post_content:
Offered here are 6 different colored S74 Silks in varying condition. 
Marquard HOF Green silk with Red printing. Nice condition with both the Factory Number at the top and Old Mill at the bottom both easily readable. Minimal fraying and no creasing 179.00

Schlei Yellow colored silk with red printing. Some staining can be seen on the front and the back. Light fraying as both the factory at the top and Old Mill at the bottom easily readable 49.00
Oldring Bronze colored silk with red printing. Some fraying bottom right corner. Factory at the top and Old Mill at the bottom easily readable 65.0

I cannot guarantee numerical grades from SGC but I do guarantee authenticity so at least an A

6.00 for shipping with tracking. All prices net to me. make and offer for some or all. Thanks for looking
3 sold. Marquard discounted to185.00, Schlei 49.00 and Oldring 65
